title: Classic + High Noon Jhin Recall Audio De-Sync
body:
I have noticed this many-a-time while playing High Noon {{champion:202}} so I thought that it was reported already, but I just tried to look for any thread about it and there was nothing exactly on it.

Whenever I start recalling and I check out another part of the map by unlocking my screen. When I return to {{champion:202}} still backing, however, all of the audio for the recall animation would be off. The gunshots, the music, everything. Perhaps you peeps could look into this? 

I'm not sure if this effects the Classic skin or not. Will test this later. (EDIT: This ALSO effects his Classic skin. Will update title to reflect this.)

replies.body:
Hiya EpicAwesomesauce! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here!

Hey, i have something else to add to the High Noon Jhin recall that i just noticed last game. When there is a Fire Fighter Tristana in the game Jhin "steals" audio from her when he shoots during the recall. It is that same issue with the whole "stealing" karmas audio! Thanks in advance, I'll send this on the Karma thread just to make sure.
